column1: Elmund Brushwood is a Bree-men of Bree in The Lord of the Rings: War in the North. He is a smith
column2: and can be found in his forge near the Prancing Pony. He has known several Rangers of the North
column3: in particular one named Hador.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
